com.thinkaurelius.titan.diskstorage

Interface ReadBuffer

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Comparable<StaticBuffer>, ScanBuffer, StaticBuffer
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ReadArrayBuffer, ReadByteBuffer

    public interface ReadBuffer
extends ScanBuffer, StaticBuffer
    A Buffer that allows sequential reads and static reads. Should not be used by multiple threads.
    Author:
    Matthias Broecheler (me@matthiasb.com)
